issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
When setup appc CLI on the latest version of windows 10 2020 H2 the CLI installed but there is an issue with native modules.

{code}
C:\Windows\system32>appc setup
Finding latest version 8.1.1 OK
Validating security checksum OK
Installing  OK
Compiling platform native modulesFailed to rebuild native modules. Please contact Appcelerator Support at support@appcelerator.com.
{code}
fields.summary: Windows 10 OS: Compiling platform native modulesFailed to rebuild

comments.body:
It works when installing necessary tools like Python and Visual studio build tools
which can be installed when setup NodeJS, if you have *Automatically install the necessary tools* _checked_.(/)

So if there is a clear warning message that will be great to know what we can do.
Closing as wont fix as Appc tooling will become obsolete next year
